description: This file defines the main shell component for a note management frontend application, orchestrating fetching, viewing, editing, creating, and deleting notes, integrating various subcomponents and API calls.

methods.name: NotesShell
methods.description: Main React functional component managing notes display, creation, editing, and deletion workflows.

methods.name: refreshNotes
methods.description: Function to refresh the list of notes by updating the refresh flag state.

methods.name: handleSelect
methods.description: Handles selection of a note by setting its ID as active.

methods.name: handleCreate
methods.description: Initiates creation of a new note by setting mode to 'create' and clearing active note.

methods.name: handleSaveNew
methods.description: Saves a new note via API, then refreshes note list and sets it as active.

methods.name: handleSaveEdit
methods.description: Saves edits to an existing note via API, then switches to view mode.

methods.name: handleDelete
methods.description: Deletes the active note via API and resets state.
